it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.model.game.player

Class PlayerInventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.model.game.player.PlayerInventory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockInventory

    public class PlayerInventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Object containing all the resources a player can have in an Adrenaline game, including ammos, power up cards, and weapon cards.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int INITIAL_AMMOS 
      static int MAX_AMMO_PER_COLOR
      Maximum amount of ammo cubes of any one color for an inventory at any given time
      static int MAX_EQUIPMENT
      Maximum amount of equipments for an inventory at any given time
      static int MAX_WEAPONS
      Maximum amount of weapons for an inventory at any given time

      • addAmmo

        public void addAmmo(AmmoColor color,
                    int amount)
        Adds Amount ammos of the given AmmoColor to this inventory. If there is already the maximum amount of ammos for any given color, that amount doesn't change.
        Parameters:
        color - color of the new ammos
        amount - amount of the new ammos. Not negative.

      • removeAmmo

        public void removeAmmo(AmmoColor color,
                       int amount)
        Removes amount ammos of the given color form this inventory and notifies the listener of said deduction.
        Parameters:
        color - of ammos to remove
        amount - of ammos to remove

      • addWeapon

        public void addWeapon(Weapon weapon)
        Adds a Weapon to this inventory.
        Parameters:
        weapon - not null

      • removeWeapon

        public void removeWeapon(Weapon weapon)
        Removes a given weapon from this inventory. Could also be a WeaponCard.
        Parameters:
        weapon - not null

      • canAcceptPowerUp

        public boolean canAcceptPowerUp()
        Checks whether this inventory can accept a new powerup
        Returns:
        can this inventory accept a new powerup

        public void addPowerUp(PowerUpCard card)
                throws OutOfSlotsException
        Throws:
        OutOfSlotsException

      • removePowerUp

        public void removePowerUp(PowerUpCard card)
        Removes the given PowerUpCard from this inventory, if it is present (optional operation).
        Parameters:
        card - Powerup to be removed from this inventory, if present

      • removePowerUps

        public void removePowerUps(java.util.List<PowerUpCard> powerUpCardList)
        Removes from this inventory all elements of the given PowerUpCard that are present in the inventory (optional operation).
        Parameters:
        powerUpCardList - Powerups to be removed from this inventory, if present

      • getAllWeaponCards

        public java.util.List<WeaponCard> getAllWeaponCards()
        Retrieves a list of all the weapon cards of this inventory, regardless of their corresponding Weapon's state of loaded or discharged.
        Returns:
        cards of all the weapons in this inventory

      • addAmmoSet

        public void addAmmoSet(AmmoSet ammoSet)
        Adds all the ammos of the given AmmoSet to this inventory. Excesses are truncated at MAX_AMMO_PER_COLOR
        Parameters:
        ammoSet - ammos to add

      • removeAmmoSet

        public void removeAmmoSet(AmmoSet ammoSet)
        Removes all the ammos of the given AmmoSet to this inventory.
        Parameters:
        ammoSet - ammos to remove

      • getAmmoSet

        public AmmoSet getAmmoSet()
        Retrieves all the ammos in this inventory as an AmmoSet
        Returns:
        ammos in this inventory
